original: Almqvist, Lars Erik Ludvig, civiljägmästare, Lerum, f. 4/11/03 i Vänersborg av häradsskriv. A. o. Nanny Sundwall. G. 41 m. Ingrid Starck. Barn: Stig f. 42. — Stud:ex. i Vä-nersb. 24, fänr. v. Göta art :reg. 27, und:löjtn. 29, löjtn. 31, kapt. 45. Ut-ex. fr. Skogshögsk. jägm:kurs 30. Verkst. dir. o. inneh. av Fastigh. A-B Terra i Gbg. Tax:ordf., nämndeman, led. av div. komm., ndr o. sityr.
translated: Almqvist, Lars Erik Ludvig, Civilian Forest officer, Lerum, born 4th November 1903 in Vänersborg to district clerk A. and Nanny Sundwall. Married to Ingrid Starck since 1941 with one child named Stig, born in 1942. Lars completed his high school studies in Vänersborg in 1924 and became a second lieutenant in Göta Artillery Regiment in 1927. He was promoted to lieutenant in 1931 and to captain in 1945. In 1930, he completed a forestry course at the Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences. He is currently the managing director and owner of Real Estate Co. Terra in Gothenburg. Lars has held several positions of trust such as chairman of the tax council, member of various committees, and district court judge.
